subject: Pedal Issue
description_text:
Clutch and throttle pedals only register 40% when fully depressed. I
reinstalled firmware and software, restarted pc, unplugged plug back in,
different usb ports, grounded the box, nothing works. It still only
registers 40%

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 9212 中
